title: Medical Case: Katie Bryce's Seizures
description: The interns at Seattle Grace Hospital face their first major challenge as they work together to diagnose and treat Katie Bryce, a patient with unexplained seizures. Meredith Grey plays a pivotal role in identifying the cause and assisting in the surgery, marking the beginning of her journey as a surgeon.
interfering_episode_characters: Cristina Yang; Miranda Bailey; Preston Burke; Alex Karev; George O'Malley; Isobel Stevens
single_episode_progression_string: Katie Bryce is brought in with seizures. Meredith revives Katie during a critical seizure. Meredith and Cristina suspect a brain aneurysm. Derek Shepherd confirms the aneurysm. Meredith assists in Katie's surgery.

title: Medical Case: Tony Savitch's Heart Surgery
description: George O'Malley is involved in the case of Tony Savitch, a patient undergoing heart surgery. Despite assurances given to Tony's wife, Gloria, the surgery does not go as planned, and Tony dies, leaving George to deliver the devastating news.
single_episode_progression_string: George comforts Gloria before the surgery. Burke performs the surgery but Tony dies. Burke instructs George to inform Gloria about Tony's death.

title: Medical Case: Patient 4B's Pulmonary Embolism
description: Meredith Grey demonstrates her diagnostic skills by correctly identifying a pulmonary embolism in patient 4B, earning recognition from the Chief and establishing her competence among her peers.
single_episode_progression_string: Alex Karev dismisses patient 4B's symptoms. The Chief questions Alex about post-operative fever causes. Meredith identifies the symptoms as a pulmonary embolism. The Chief acknowledges Meredith's diagnosis and instructs Alex to follow her advice.

title: Meredith and Derek's Professional and Personal Entanglement
description: Meredith Grey and Derek Shepherd's relationship evolves from a one-night stand to a complex dynamic, affecting their professional interactions and personal lives at Seattle Grace Hospital.
single_episode_progression_string: Meredith wakes up next to Derek after a one-night stand. Meredith and Derek meet again at the hospital, realizing Derek is her superior. Derek offers Meredith the chance to assist in surgery, leading to tension with Cristina.

title: Meredith Grey's Journey of Growth and Legacy
description: Meredith Grey navigates the pressures of her surgical internship while grappling with her mother's legacy and her own self-doubt, striving to establish her identity at Seattle Grace Hospital.
interfering_episode_characters: Derek Shepherd; Cristina Yang; Ellis Grey; Miranda Bailey; George O'Malley; Isobel Stevens; Preston Burke; Alex Karev
single_episode_progression_string: Meredith wakes up from a one-night stand with Derek. Meredith starts her internship at Seattle Grace Hospital. Meredith learns that her mother is a renowned surgeon. Meredith diagnoses Katie Bryce's condition and is chosen to assist in surgery. Meredith decides not to sell her mother's house and plans to get roommates.

title: Intern Rivalries and Alliances
description: The interns, including Meredith, Cristina, George, and Izzie, navigate the complexities of their surgical training, forming alliances and rivalries that challenge their professional and personal relationships.
main_characters: Meredith Grey; Cristina Yang; George O'Malley; Isobel Stevens
interfering_episode_characters: Miranda Bailey; Preston Burke; Derek Shepherd
single_episode_progression_string: Meredith and Cristina bond over their shared resident. George introduces himself awkwardly, leading to misunderstandings. Cristina discovers Meredith's mother is Ellis Grey, causing tension. Burke selects George for surgery, creating rivalry. Meredith and Cristina collaborate on Katie's case. Cristina feels betrayed when Meredith is chosen for surgery.

title: Cristina Yang's Relentless Pursuit of Excellence
description: Cristina Yang's ambition drives her to excel in her internship, often leading to conflicts with peers and mentors as she seeks to prove her surgical prowess.
single_episode_progression_string: Cristina connects with Meredith and learns they share the same resident. Cristina expresses her desire for surgery to Bailey. Cristina and Meredith work together to diagnose Katie Bryce. Cristina is upset when Meredith is chosen for surgery.

title: George O'Malley's Quest for Confidence
description: George O'Malley navigates the challenges of being a surgical intern, facing self-doubt and striving to prove his competence at Seattle Grace Hospital.
interfering_episode_characters: Preston Burke; Meredith Grey; Cristina Yang; Izzie Stevens
single_episode_progression_string: George is selected to assist in an appendectomy. He makes a mistake during the procedure. Burke steps in to complete the surgery. George is nicknamed 007 by his peers. George expresses regret about his career choice.

title: Ellis Grey's Shadow Over Meredith
description: Meredith Grey navigates her career as a surgical intern while dealing with the expectations and legacy left by her mother, Ellis Grey, a renowned surgeon.
interfering_episode_characters: Cristina Yang; Richard Webber; Ellis Grey; Derek Shepherd
single_episode_progression_string: Meredith starts her internship at Seattle Grace Hospital. Cristina reveals Meredith's mother is the famous surgeon Ellis Grey. The Chief recognizes Meredith's resemblance to Ellis. Meredith decides not to sell her mother's house and plans to get roommates.

title: Bailey's Formidable Mentorship
description: Miranda Bailey, known for her tough love approach, mentors the interns with a firm hand, guiding them through the rigors of their surgical training.
interfering_episode_characters: Meredith Grey; Cristina Yang; George O'Malley; Isobel Stevens; Alex Karev
single_episode_progression_string: Bailey introduces herself to the interns with a strict demeanor. She assigns tasks to each intern, setting high expectations. Bailey surprises the interns by being a woman and not a Nazi. She gives Izzie a challenging task to perform rectal exams. Bailey is paged and leads the interns to a critical case on the roof. She instructs Meredith to handle a CT scan for Katie Bryce. Bailey is woken up by Izzie for a central line and teaches her the procedure. Bailey lectures Meredith after the seizure incident with Katie.

title: Challenges Within Seattle Grace Hospital
description: The interns at Seattle Grace Hospital face the intense demands of their medical training, navigating professional challenges, personal relationships, and the high-pressure environment of a top medical facility.
main_characters: Meredith Grey; Miranda Bailey; Derek Shepherd
interfering_episode_characters: Cristina Yang; George O'Malley; Preston Burke; Izzie Stevens; Alex Karev
single_episode_progression_string: Meredith begins her internship at Seattle Grace Hospital. Bailey introduces the interns to the hospital's rules and expectations. Meredith handles a CT scan for Katie Bryce. Meredith identifies a potential aneurysm in Katie Bryce, leading to a successful surgery. The interns confront the reality of their responsibilities and the pressure of their new roles.

title: Alex Karev's Struggle for Respect
description: Alex Karev navigates professional challenges and conflicts as he strives to earn respect and establish himself as a competent surgical intern amidst his peers and superiors.
single_episode_progression_string: Alex dismisses a nurse's concern about a patient's condition. Meredith correctly diagnoses the patient, undermining Alex's authority. The Chief assigns Alex to follow Meredith's advice, highlighting his need for improvement.
